content: {A抱歉}*ahem* What I mean to say is, I can help make your wish come true. As long as it's something I can do, just say the word... My ears and I are always here for you.
info: 萨飞里初见后续-交付后对话_萨飞里

content: {A害羞挠头}Ahem, the treasure...{短暂停} is this feather. It's the coming-of-age gift I prepared for my little brother. Without it, the ceremony won't be complete.
info: 萨飞里初见后续-交付后对话_萨飞里

content: Oh! Your reward! Got any wishes? Back in my hometown, there's a custom: if you tell your wish to the wind, it'll come true the next time a tumbleweed rolls by.
info: 萨飞里初见后续-交付后对话_萨飞里

content: {A加油}Asante sana! If it weren't for you, I'd probably still be searching for days.
info: 萨飞里初见后续-交付后对话_萨飞里

content: It's just, well, the story with that parrot is kinda, *ahem* embarrassing, so I didn't tell you right away. Anyway—
info: 萨飞里初见后续-交付后对话_萨飞里

content: {A虎掌碎石}Let's see... this one? Nope. That one? Hmm...{短暂停} nope again.
info: 萨飞里初见后续-交付后对话_萨飞里

content: {A虎啸}<style=SizeBig>HISS—!</style> Bahati sana! You actually found it — the{短暂停} <style=SizeBig>feather</style> stuck on the fruit!
info: 萨飞里初见后续-交付后对话_萨飞里

content: Oh, I see. Don't mention it.
info: 萨飞里初见后续-交付后对话_萨飞里

content: You have no idea how alert that parrot was! I only got this feather while it was busy showing off its mating dance moves... I had to pull every hunting trick I've ever learned in my entire life!
info: 萨飞里初见后续-交付后对话_萨飞里
